src:
Ahsan/Hendra dan Jonatan Christie ke Babak Kedua Fuzhou China Terbuka 2019
07 Nov 2019, 08:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pasangan ganda putra Indonesia, Mohammad Ahsan/Hendra Setiawan, berhasil lolos ke babak kedua Fuzhou China Terbuka 2019. Menjalani laga babak pertama di Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Rabu (6/11/2019), Ahsan/Hendra bersua wakil Chinese Taipei, Lee Yang/Wang Chi-Lin.
Ahsan/Hendra yang merupakan unggulan kedua harus bekerja keras untuk bisa mengatasi perlawanan Lee/Wang. Usai bertarung selama 57 menit, Ahsan/Hendra akhirnya menang 27-25, 22-24, dan 21-17 atas Lee/Wang.
"Kami sudah menyangka akan ramai kalau bertemu mereka, memang selalu tidak mudah kalau melawan mereka. Pada gim kedua kami terlalu banyak kasih bola-bola pelan, mereka sudah antisipasi dan kami balik tertekan," ucap Hendra.
"Pada gim ketiga, kami fokus di pukulan pembukaan, dan kami usahakan turunkan bola supaya dapat kesempatan untuk menyerang," lanjutnya dalam rilis dari PBSI.
Pada 16 besar Fuzhou China Terbuka 2019, Hendra/Ahsan akan berjumpa wakil tuan rumah, Zhang Nan/Ou Xuan Yi. Sebelumnya, Zhang/Ou menang 21-11, 21-15 atas wakil Chinese Taipei, Lin Chia Yu/Yang Ming-Tse.
text:
Ahsan / Hendra and Jonatan Christie to the Second Round of the Fuzhou China Open 2019
Nov 7 2019, 08:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian men's doubles partner Mohammad Ahsan / Hendra Setiawan made it to the second round of the Fuzhou China Open 2019. Undergoing the first round match at Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Wednesday (11/06/2019), Ahsan / Hendra met with Chinese representatives Taipei, Lee Yang / Wang Chi-Lin.
Ahsan / Hendra who is the second seed must work hard to overcome Lee / Wang's resistance. After fighting for 57 minutes, Ahsan / Hendra finally won 27-25, 22-24, and 21-17 over Lee / Wang.
"We had expected that it would be crowded if we met them, it was always not easy to fight them. In the second game we gave too many slow balls, they were anticipated and we were under pressure," Hendra said.
"In the third game, we focus on the opening punch, and we try to put the ball down so we have a chance to attack," he continued in a release from PBSI.
In the last 16 of the Fuzhou China Open 2019, Hendra / Ahsan will meet the host representative, Zhang Nan / Ou Xuan Yi. Previously, Zhang / Ou won 21-11, 21-15 over the representative of Chinese Taipei, Lin Chia Yu / Yang Ming-Tse.
